text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a _DedicatedNonClinicalLocationRoleType

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _DedicatedNonClinicalLocationRoleTypeDedicatedNonClinicalLocationRoleTypeA role of a place that further classifies a setting that is intended to house the provision of non-clinical services.

name: DedicatedNonClinicalLocationRoleType
title: DedicatedNonClinicalLocationRoleType
description: A role of a place that further classifies a setting that is intended to house the provision of non-clinical services.
